Actions.Name: Annihilate
Actions.Effect: Attack target becomes vulnerable and burning. Attacks against a burning foe increase the area size to blast 2.
Actions.TerrainEffect: After attack resolves, summon a height 1 boulder object in the area.

Actions.Name: Fell Shot
Actions.Description: Mark an unoccupied space in range 8.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters that enter that space are struck by a projectile, taking [D] damage and ending this effect.

Actions.Name: Liminal Arrows
Actions.Description: Choose a foe in line of sight and range 10. At the end of that character's turn, it takes [D] piercing damage 3 times if not in cover from the Master wright. Then this effect ends.
